scripts.build:win: npm run build:prepare && nwbuild -p win32,win64 -o dist/ app/
scripts.build:mac: npm run build:prepare && nwbuild -p osx64 -o dist/ app/
scripts.build:linux: npm run build:prepare && nwbuild -p linux32,linux64 -o dist/ app/
scripts.build:prepare: mkdir build && cp package.json package-lock.json build/ && cd build && npm install --production && cd ../ && cp -r build/node_modules app/ && rm -rf build
